txt.en: Raphûz requested you meet him in the deepest part of Nirgambâr to seek wealth from the Dead that make the tombs their home.
'I am prepared if you are, my friend. I do not wish to linger near this place any longer than we must.'
You found Raphûz in the ruins of Nirgambâr. He is prepared to find wealth among the Dead here. Work with him and find the wealth he desires.
Raphûz was gravely injured and needed to retreat
Help Raphûz recover enough wealth to appease Igbâl
Raphûz claimed to have acquired enough wealth from the Dead to meet Igbâl's request. He asked you to meet him back at his home in Jirush to discuss further.
Speak with Raphûz at his home in Jirush
'This should command Igbâl's attention and earn me his respect. With your aid, I have done all he asked. Surely, he will provide his blessing to me.'
Complete Instance: Wealth of the Dead
Aid Raphûz in completing his task
'I am ready to proceed if you are, my friend. I know if you are by my side, I cannot fail.'
Raphûz reflected on the information about the wealth in the Tombs of Nirgambâr and asks you to meet him there to acquire the amount needed to meet Igbâl's request.
You made your way into Nirgambâr and found Raphûz
Make your way to the last pillars leading into Nirgambâr

'I will find some time to leave my work aside and make my way to the tombs. I learned there is an entrance into the depths at the far north-west area after a walkway lined with ancient pillars.\n\n'Meet me just beyond the last of the pillars. I will wait for you there. Together we will claim great wealth.'
